item.title: About
item.description: I enjoy spending my days doing Android Development at General Motors and in my free time I have fun working on neural networks and functional programming (Haskell bing my drug of choice). Programming is a second career for me. I studied law at the Univerity of Michigan and practiced for 8 years as a judicial law clerk, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, and corporate litigator before discovering my love for programming and switching careers.
